conversations.content: ...Shady omikuji?
Inside this chest of drawers?
This here is called a ＂tansu,＂ and yer darn tootin' it's got shady omikuji!
Omikuji are fortunes, right? Those little slips of paper with the writing on 'em?
Right. Back in Hinomoto, we draw 'em to learn if our luck's gonna be good or bad.
Another Hinomotoan tradition. Neat!
Yessir, but THESE omikuji ain't yer average fortunes.
Be it good or bad, the stuff written on these puppies ALWAYS comes true.
Well that's soundin' less like a fortune and more like a prophecy.
Yes, that seems far beyond the realm  of mere fortunetelling.
Which is why Lord Seimei always comes 'round to exorcise 'em.
And THAT'S why yers truly is guardin' this tansu until he can show up and give it the business.
Hello, everyone. What's going on here?
Oh, we were just discussing omikuji.
I am...not familiar with the term.
Piiiiii-yeeeeeeeeeee!
SWEET SALTY BUTTERCORN! NOT THE TANSU!
Okay, who punted Pipple?!
Wheeeee hee hee hee ha ha hoooo!
(The flying Pipple sent me stumbling, and then...)
(I feel as though I knocked something over during my fall.)
You okay, Elisanne?!
...Ouch.
Seriously, you okay?
I got m'doubts about that...
I'm well, thank you. Just a little spill.
But the omikuji...
Might someone please inform me what exactly these ＂omikuji＂ are?
These ain't just any omikuji—they're SHADY omikuji! And when the tansu got knocked over, it sent one of 'em a'flyin'!
Here, go on n' take it!
It reads ＂Fortune: Bunlucky＂? Whatever does THAT mean?
Beats me. Omikuji normally come in yer usual lucky and unlucky flavors, but that there's a new one.
＂Bunlucky＂ is like bread, yeah? Or maybe it's talking about bunnies? ...Wait, is it even a WORD?
What else does it say?
＂Bunlucky: All's well that ends well. 'Hop' you have sweet dreams.＂
＂Your wish will be foiled by another's interference. Too bad, so sad!＂
＂The one you await isn't coming, so go seek them out yourself.＂
＂What's lost is often found right under your nose, but keep your eyes up.＂
＂In travels, beware fire and water. In business, you're in the way. Just don't.＂
＂In love, you're unstoppable—and the one you fancy will sit up and take notice. Go get 'im, snuggle bunny!＂
...This is beyond nonsensical.
Guess that ain't as bad as it COULD be?
Still, if all that is written comes to pass, it sounds like quite the gauntlet.
Shady or not, this is a mere fortune. There's no need to worry ourselves silly over it.
Nothing will come of—Hm? There is something beneath that statue...
That's...my novel! Oh, I have been searching for this for so very long!
It is a favorite of mine, and I was terribly sad when I realized it had gone missing.
To think I passed it by a hundredfold times or more and never noticed! It truly was right under my...
Eeep?
The statue's falling! OUTTA THE WAY!
Goodness, but that was close! It's a lucky thing no one was hurt.
I find all of this to be exceedingly strange. Why would a statue suddenly topple over of its own accord?
It's just as the omikuji predicted...
She's right! Remember what it said? ＂What's lost is often found right under yer nose, but keep yer dang eyes up!＂
Does that mean everything ELSE in that fortune is gonna come true next?!
It couldn't possibly.
Ain't nothin' to do for it but stay on yer toes and keep a sharp eye. 'Cause if ya don't, ya can kiss yer pretty little life goodbye!
You mean I could...die? Ulp!
(The year has only begun, and I already find myself off to an inauspicious start...)
＂In business, you're in the way. Just don't.＂
Okay, are you TRYING to sabotage me here, Elisanne?!
Of course not!! The hallway was merely cluttered, so I thought to help by tidying it.
Do you have ANY idea how long it took me to sort all that product?! And now it's all ruined! Broken! DESTROYED!
I'm terribly sorry, truly. But you see, Matilda suddenly appeared at my feet, so I—
I'm sorry. MATILDA? You expect me to buy that a stuffed animal just showed up out of nowhere? I've heard lame excuses before, but that is LAMER than lame.
But it is the truth! She simply appeared before me as if from thin air!
Well, you can stick with whatever stupid story you want, but I still expect you to help me sort this mess out!
＂In travels, beware fire and water.＂
AAaAAAAaaaAaAaAAAH!
Say, so I don't wanna pry or nothing... BUT WHY ARE YOU ON FIRE?!
AaaAAaaAaAAaaAAAaAAH!
Well, that's one way to put a fire out. Feeling better there? ...Elisanne?
Huh. I'm no water scientist, but I really think she should have come up for air by now...
Oh, hell! Hang on, Elisanne! I'm comin'!
*GASP* *HEAVE* I forgot...I was wearing a kimono... *COUGH* I thought that would be the end of me for certain.
Well, I'm very glad it wasn't—and also, I am so, so, SO sorry about that whole ＂setting you on fire＂ thing.
I never thought for a second the flame from that teeeeeny little explosion would catch your ponytail like that.
Explosion? Wait, I thought you two were doing the rounds offering New Year's greetings. What exploded?
Luca, have you MET Sinoa? Everything explodes around her.
Sorry again. Really, REALLY sorry.
You needn't be. I expected something like this to happen the moment I saw we had been paired up.
＂Your wish will be foiled by another's interference. Too bad, so sad!＂
Oof! Between helping Francesca and the New Year's greeting debacle—not to mention my patrols and training—I am simply exhausted.
I need a moment of rest. Only a moment...
Hey, Elisanne! Where you at?
Elisaaaanne!
*sigh* It seems there is no rest for the brave and resourceful this day...
You have it so good as an animal, Matilda. No work is piled high upon your plate, and no one takes you to task for errors.
I wish I could be an animal, too—or nay, a plant! Plants simply exist as the world  rushes by all around them.
They don't have to walk, or talk, or... Pffft! Aaah ha ha ha!
Pipple?
By the Goddess, even the vegetables aren't afforded a moment's rest here.
I just...wanted a little break... Just a short rest... And yet... Nnngh...
Pipple pi? Piiiii!
Are you all right, Elly? I heard you fainted.
I apologize for causing a scene, Highness. I was able to rest for a while after that, so you needn't worry over me.
With everything on that omikuji coming true, I'd be worn out, too.
Omikuji?
You see I... Hmm? This presence...
Er, ain't that your stuffy buddy?
Eeeek! Matilda!
Aw, Matilda is adorable! There's no need to be scared of—
She's always there. SHE'S ALWAYS THERE!
Er, she's always where?
At the scene of the crime when the effects of the omikuji come to pass!
I haven't once taken her out of my room, but she's always there! It is as if she is watching me! FOLLOWING me!
The omikuji said I'm ＂bunlucky＂! THAT is what this is!
Let's all maybe take a deep breath or five, yeah? I don't think Matilda is stalking you.
I'm bunlucky because of Matilda! IT'S MATILDA BECAUSE I'M BUNLUCKY!
Breathe, Elly!
Plus, even if everything written on that omikuji IS gonna come true, so what?
I mean, you've been through nearly all of it by now, right?
Now that you mention it, the only entries still untouched are the person I await and my romantic fortunes...
＂The one you await isn't coming, so go seek them out yourself.＂
And ＂In love, you're unstoppable—and the one you fancy will sit up and take notice. Go get 'im, snuggle bunny!＂
(Neither sound TOO terrible, but it is hard to say what effects they might bring...)
You know, maybe it makes sense to just get those two over with so you can go back to your normal, boring, Elisanne life.
That does indeed sound tempting...
Nnngh!
Your Highness? What's the matter?!
GrrrraaaaAAAAAGH!
Euden!
＂In love, you're unstoppable—and the one you fancy will sit up and take notice. Go get 'im, snuggle bunny!＂
GrrrraaaaAAAAAGH!
What is it, Your Highness? Are you hurt?!
LUCA! Bring a healer at once!
On it!
Nrrgh... My body's...on fire...
What could have happened to him?!
Matilda!
What have you done, you foul, fluffy demon?! What have you done to His Highness?!
Nrgk!
Your Highness!
...Honey bunny.
Muh?
Hey there, honey bunny!
Uhhh, is he broken?
Nope! I feel perfectly normal—and more specifically, I feel like the guy who loves THIS gal more than anything!
EXPLAIN YOURSELF!
Calm down a second, Mym!
Look out! She's goin' crazy!
This isn't any mere anger, but the wrath of a woman scorned!
Who cares what the hell ya call it?! Help me stop her before we all end up as a steamin' pile'a charcoal briquettes!
What do we doooo?!
My apologies, Your Highness. The fault here is mine alone.
What could you ever have to apologize for, sugar lips? I'm just glad you're not hurt.
You're very kind...
It's my life's work to keep you safe, babe.
Rrrgh...
Aw, is my babe blushing? That's adorable!
(My heart is about to explode...)
Apologies, but I must excuse myself!
Heh heh. Ain't she just the cutest?
(My pulse races to hear those words... To have His Highness treat me so.)
(Thanks to that damnable omikuji, I've made naught but trouble for everyone. And yet...I am enjoying it?)
A few days later...
We're under attack!
Elisanne, back me up!
Of course. Lead the way.
Hold it right there, bub!
Your Highness?! What is the matter?
The battlefield is a dangerous place, and I'm not letting you risk your beautiful neck out there.
But I am a Paladyn! I swore an oath to protect people from harm, and am one of our strongest warriors besides!
Nope! Noooot happening. You'll need to find some other chickee to be your cannon fodder today, Luca.
I can't believe this is... Fine, whatever. Yo, everybody! I need help over here!
GRRRRR!
That night...
Well?! Answer me!
Are you well satisfied now that you have stolen away my darling's heart with your foul and wretched sorcery?!
Was your love for him always this cheap? This selfish?! You...you...you FLOOZY!
(The prince treats me differently than all the others now—almost as if I were some helpless storybook princess.)
(Is this truly what I was striving for all this time? Is it what I truly WANT?)
Don't you dare ignore me, Elisanne! What are you going to do about this?!
Thought ya might turn up.
I need your help.
Ain't my help ya need—it's Lord Seimei's. Lemme holler 'im down for ya.
HEY, MASTER! YA GOTS A CUSTOMER!
Took you long enough.
I'm sorry?
I hear my stupid fox caused quite the ruckus earlier.
Wait, so ya already knew?!
Hard not to know, what with the prince running around acting like a damn lunatic.
Aha ha ha ha...haaaaa?
This started with your screw-up, Kuzunoha. I trust you have apologized?
Oh, abjectly! Again, I'm real sorry about all the fussin' and feudin' I caused ya.
So then, I take it you have come here for an exorcism?
If it is possible to reverse the omikuji's effects, I beg you to make it so.
Though your coming here means the fortune has basically run its course.
I'm sorry?
The effects written on the omikuji. They've all played out, yes?
All but the portion about ＂the one I await.＂
*sigh* Do I really need to explain this?
Er, isn't it the person I love?
*SIGH* Nope.
But does the phrase not usually take on that meaning?!
You're overthinking it; it just means the one fated to lead you in the right direction.
Could be any age or any gender. A friend, a teacher... Anyone, really.
I had no idea.
And you walked all the way here. By yourself. To me. Do you get it now?
＂The one you await isn't coming, so go seek them out yourself...＂
By Ilia! Are you saying ＂the one I await＂ is YOU, Lord Seimei?!
Well, look at the big brain on you. Though I must say, I'm a bit surprised you'd give up your situation willingly.
You sure you want this thing reversed? REALLY sure?
What are you driving at, sir?
Pffft. Like you don't know. The prince.
The battlefield is a dangerous place, and I'm not letting you risk your beautiful neck out there.
That was not the prince I love, but some other man entirely.
His protective instincts are noble, but I ought never to be their target.
His duty lies with the people, and my own with protecting him. Such is the correct order of things.
Well, if you're sure you won't regret it, let's get this party started.
(This is the right choice— the ONLY choice.)
Ngh?! What is this power?!
Elisanne, get down!
What?!
(Come to think of it, there was one more thing written on that omikuji that has not yet come to pass...)
(No!)
Nngh...
Am I back in my room?
(There was an explosion, and then... Was I spared somehow?)
Are Seimei and Kuzunoha all right? I must make certain!
Fortunetelling seems a familiar part of daily life in Hinomoto.
Moreso than elsewhere, perhaps.
Oh, Elly! I'm glad you're awake.
Yes, though I am terribly sorry to give you cause for worry.
(His Highness seems himself again. Has the omikuji's hold been broken?)
I'm relieved to see you safe as well, Lord Seimei.
Beg pardon?
That explosion felt all too deadly. It is a relief that neither of us came to harm.
What are you going on about?
Huh? But the...
Elisanne, do you not remember what happened?
I remember it all too well! That cursed omikuji made my life a waking nightmare.
Your problem was less with the omikuji  and more with the tansu.
After your collision with Pipple, you knocked over the tansu.
You mostly got clear of it before it fell, but it trapped the hem of your kimono, causing you to take quite the spill!
You took a bump to the head and have been out cold ever since.
That can't...
(But I remember the fortune so clearly. It felt far too lucid to be...)
So it was truly all in my mind, then?
Sounds like someone had a rough first dream.
First dream?
It's common Hinomotoan practice to read one's fortune through dreams—especially the first one of the new year.
Just a dream...
＂Bunlucky: All's well that ends well. 'Hop' you have sweet dreams.＂
Surely this can't be...
Ah... AHHHHHH!
Hey, it's your little plush friend, Matilda. What's she doing out here?
If you tell me about the dream you saw, I can divine your fortune for the year.
No! No more fortunes EVER!
She ran off quick as a spooked hare. What do you suppose got into her?
Who can say?
*wink!*
